entry.title: castaway
entry.summary:
Author: starry_somnia

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,834Chapters: 4/10Kudos: 52

Summary: See, the thing was,“Going somewhere, demon?”The thing was —“Anywhere is better than here, Drake.” The ‘where you are not’ was unspoken — and the message was supposed to be clear. The ‘I should not have done this what the fuck was I thinking’ implied. The ‘I am going to get the hell out of here’ inferred.The thing was, Damian had fucked up. Majorly.Made worse by the fact this wasn't even the first time he’d made this specific mistake, but the third.—aka, estranged trust fund brat, Damian al Ghul Wayne, sleeps with his sworn enemy who is also his brother's best friend, Timothy Drake. Because he has a problem with impulse control — and that's before he gets cut off. There's no way this ends well.

entry.title: Life on the Other Side
entry.summary:
Author: Akio_O

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,847Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 34

Summary: For Timothy Drake, obsession is far worse than compulsion.Compulsivity is action. Action can be taken and completed at any time, it’s mindless. It’s repetitive movement, expected and anticipated more often than not.Obsession is far worse. Obsession plagues the mind and overtakes rationality. It spins spiderwebs in the brain and warps your very being. It can spawn from the simplest thing and then spiral into an all encompassing essentiality.TLDR; Tim needs to know everything, Damian is hard to know and the world makes it impossible. Plus a stroll on the darker side of Gotham!

entry.title: Finding Tim Drake
entry.summary:
Author: Chaotic_evil_stuff

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 441,974Chapters: 125/150Kudos: 725

Summary: Tim returns to Gotham after long time with the Titans to focus more on Tim Drake rather than Red Robin and regain some normality. Damian, now 20 years old, has developed some respect for Tim in his absence. He tries his very best to make Tim feel welcomed. The fresh start for both boys allows them to become more than rivals, and much more than friends too.The years of their relationship unfolds as their lives change for better, for worse and with new (and unexpected) additions to their daily life. How will they manage them? How will it change them? Who and what is waiting for their chance to ruin it all? This is part 1 of my series and is still ongoing and updated regularly.Smut is on separate chapters, so if you're not into that, this can be read without it and still have a full cohesive story.

entry.title: 150 Shades of Bat
entry.summary:
Author: Mat_Vibes

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 41,626Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 162

Summary: “I require your assistance with something important,” Damian said, opening the notebook with solemn reverence. “It’s a delicate matter.”Tim squinted at a tab labeled ‘frottage, rooftop edition.’ “Is it tax fraud? Please tell me it’s tax fraud.”“No,” Damian said. He flipped three pages and adjusted a glossy photo held in place by a literal sewing needle. “There are 150 kinks I must test and evaluate prior to pursuing any romantic entanglements.”Tim stared.Damian continued. “I have organized them by category, severity, potential for logistical complications, and whether they require a pulley system.”“WHAT?!”Damian raised an eyebrow. “There’s no need to yell.”“You kidnapped me to show me your sex spreadsheet?!”

entry.title: Dicroismo [Timdami]
entry.summary:
Author: Succiduous_be

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,166Chapters: 6/22Kudos: 13

Summary: There's a path between indulgence and vulnerability. At some point in this, a year-long process of gravitating, being each other's binary star, Timothy realized he had taken advantage, he had eaten more than he could bite. Now he can't face the consequences. Although it was too late, there was only one answer.
